statements: SELECT * FROM StockPrices ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC, date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT stock_id, stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE stock_id = 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY stock_id ASC, date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM StockPrices GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING avg_price > 75 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM StockPrices WHERE stock_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM StockPrices GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND price < 50 ORDER BY date ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol FROM stock_prices ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT date, stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol FROM stock_prices WHERE price < 500 ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT trend_id, date, analysis_result FROM stock_trends ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT stock_name, date FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT market_name, open_price, close_price FROM stock_market WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT stock_name, price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_name = 'Apple' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY stock_id DESC;
SELECT stock_name, price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT stock_name, market_name, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices JOIN stock_market ON stock_prices.stock_id = stock_market.stock_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM stock_categories GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY price DESC, date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ticker_symbol, price, date FROM stocks WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT analyst_name, rating, company_id FROM analysts WHERE rating = 'Buy' ORDER BY analyst_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, ticker_symbol, price, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stocks
SELECT ticker_symbol, price FROM stocks ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT ticker_symbol, price FROM stocks WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY ticker_symbol ASC
SELECT t.ticker_symbol, t.price, c.company_name FROM stocks t JOIN companies c ON t.ticker_symbol = c.company_name
SELECT a.analyst_name, a.rating, c.company_name FROM analysts a INNER JOIN companies c ON a.company_id = c.company_id
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM stocks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, industry, country FROM companies WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT symbol, price, date FROM stocks WHERE price > 50;
SELECT s.symbol, p.price, p.date FROM stocks s JOIN prices p ON s.id = p.stock_id;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC
SELECT symbol, price FROM stocks WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, industry FROM companies WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name
SELECT s.symbol, p.price, p.date FROM stocks s JOIN prices p ON s.id = p.stock_id WHERE p.price < 50 ORDER BY p.date DESC
SELECT c.name, c.industry, s.price FROM companies c JOIN stocks s ON c.id = s.id WHERE s.price > 100
